Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40661 affecting package opensc for versions less than 0.25.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-40661 affecting package opensc for versions less than 0.25.1-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package opensc is earlier than 0.25.1-3, affected by CVE-2023-40661
